title: Try Homescapes instead
text: I hadn’t played Candy Crush in about a month, opened it up and got rewards for coming back after being gone so long. Well the app then updated and wouldn’t allow me to open it. When I was finally able to, all rewards and everything were gone. Homescapes is kinda like Candy Crush, but you earn stars as you defeat levels and can renovate houses. Better way to pass my time. Byeeeee Candy Crush

title: Why????
text: I’ve been playing this game from the day it came out. I have spent $100’s of dollars playing. I now don’t make that dumb choice. As much $$ as you guys have made off this game, I feel it is EXTREMELY RIDICULOUS that we earn the gold bars but soon as our piggy bank is full if we do not pay you $2.99 we cannot use them. That’s stealing from your loyal players. Why?? I would have given this game TOP RATING but since you guys treat your fans this way I just can’t. Please re-think this option.

title: Time to Quit
text:
When do you decide to quit playing Candy Crush you ask?  Right now and here is why. When you initially start playing this game you get joy and satisfaction of winning. Usually you can win the game you are playing after a few tries without buying anything to help you win.  The games start getting harder, then harder and you find that you have to start buying help to win.  You are not spending much so it’s ok.  Now I am attempting to win even harder games and it becomes very frustrating and not fun at all.  You are spending more to help you win.  Finally after spending over $100.00 a month trying to win and move up I have had enough. I am spending about $130.00 a month now and I still can not win game 3694 so I am stuck playing the same game while paying more and more.  I am moving to other games that are fun and free.  Candy Crush is no longer fun.  It is stressful and not enjoyable anymore.  
.

title: Turn off hints
text: Super glitchy lately. I can’t turn off the hints. I’ve done it before but now when I go into settings it’s not there. Also, the help button isn’t working. I look something up and it says “oops. Try again later”. Add that to the fact I lost about 1,000 levels because of the two different devices I use, and I’m pretty much done with candy crush. Sad really. I love the game.

title: PLEASE READ BEFORE GETTING THE GAME
text:
1- There is no end to this game. No one will play the thousands upon thousands of levels the game has. Sometimes it's nice to have the satisfaction of finishing a game but no one humane is doing all those levels

2- There is this weird glitch for me where the game just randomly makes moves for me and ends up losing for me. It's stupid

3- Candy Crush isn't anything original. I can go play another game like it and have more enjoyment there. Candy Crush is just the lucky app that the public recognizes.

4- A few years ago I played this game a lot and I had used my email to save my progress. Two years later I re-downladed the game again and signed in with my email (same email as before) and it said that the game was unfamiliar with this type of email.

5- When I am playing with four bars and good wifi the game claims that I am "Not Connected" so that ends up pausing things up for me.

6- When using the prize wheel, I get the same thing every time. Which just so happened to be the worst thing. The game practically goes out of its way to give you bad prizes. Yet another bad aspect of the game.

7- The game is very repetitive and I could find myself basically playing the same level over and over and over again. The game needs originality instead of making hundreds of copies of one level

8- In many cases, it's the games job. No not job, purpose to force you into spending lots of money on in app purchases. I myself have avoided that but many of my friends have spent hundreds of dollars on completing a level just because the game didn't give enough options and forced them to spend there money. It's quite sad.

Long story short, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME

1. It gives you rewards you can’t use:  such as a game aid that lasts 15 minutes when you have 27 min. until your next life

3. When a special, limited time new feature is added, it thinks you have to be told EVERY TIME YOU PLAY!  guess what?  Another “ok” click!

title: Reward timing irritating
text: I have played this game on and off for several years and although I enjoy the game, I agree with the previous review that the pop ups are annoying.  I like the 15 to 30 minute rewards but just want to use them when I get them. I got so frustrated with the timing of those awards for the multiple play candies.  You acquire them while playing but don’t get rewarded for them until you have run out of lives.  At that point, you get the helpful tools for 15 minutes but you don’t get another life for 30 minutes.  Come on! I deleted the game.

title: Ideas for a great update!!
text: This game is already awesome but it can get even better. Have some ideas for a social space in the game. In this social space you can talk to your friends as well as the world. Like different chats within the social space. Also when your friends are stuck on a level you should have it where you can get help once a day or 3 days or even a week. So you send them a help request and when they accept they play your level you’re stuck on and it uses one of your lives or you can have it use no lives. Also you can send lives through the social space. Also can you have an arrow or like a level guide on the side so you can go to the bottom easier bc it’s a tedious thing to send lives to people without them asking or maybe you do that so we won’t do that I’m not sure. But I’ve told people this I play with and they said I should email you guys but idk if you would take it seriously or not.
